originalCode.name: Dark is the Night
originalCode.description: The night is darkest before the dawn, but I promise you: the dawn is coming.

events.onModEnable: function (mod) { var area = this.MapsHandler.getArea(); if (!area) { return; } mod.events.onPreSetLocation.call(this, mod); }
events.onPreSetLocation: function (mod) { var area = this.MapsHandler.getArea(); area.setting += " Castle Alt2"; area.setBackground(area); this.PixelDrawer.setBackground(area.background); this.GroupHolder.callOnAll(this, this.PixelDrawer.setThingSprite.bind(this.PixelDrawer)); this.ModAttacher.fireEvent("onSetLocation", this.MapsHandler.getLocation()); }
events.onModDisable: function (mod) { var area = this.MapsHandler.getArea(); area.setting = area.setting.replace(" Castle Alt2", ""); area.setBackground(area); this.PixelDrawer.setBackground(area.background); this.GroupHolder.callOnAll(this, this.PixelDrawer.setThingSprite.bind(this.PixelDrawer)); this.ModAttacher.fireEvent("onSetLocation", this.MapsHandler.getLocation()); }
